Happy evening;
Dear Parents,
It is planned to conduct extra classes from wednesday
(07.08.2024) from 3.45 P.M. to 4.45 P.M
Thanks!

Students who have submitted willing form can attend the class
regularly without any break
Thanks!

Bus facility available upto chengalpattu at 4.45 P.M. from our
campus for users only
Thanks!

No extra classes on 22.08.2024 to 26.08.2024
Extra classes will resume from 27.08.2024
Thanks!
